headline: Energy Companies from Around the World Win Honors at S&P Global Energy's 27th Annual Platts Global Energy Awards
summary: S&P Global Energy (formerly S&P Global Commodity Insights), the leading global independent provider of data, insights, analysis, and benchmark prices for the commodities and energy expansion markets, tonight honored industry excellence in 21 performance categories and winners from across the globe at the Platts Global Energy Awards gala held at the Casa Cipriani South Street in downtown New York City.

content.title: Energy Companies from Around the World Win Honors at S&P Global Energy's 27th Annual Platts Global Energy Awards
